entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
